content: HAVANA/WASHINGTON  Sept 28 JetBlue Airways Corp  will add a second charter flight from New York's John F. Kennedy airport to Havana  expanding charter service ahead of an expected opening of commercial air travel between the two countries  the company said on Monday.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-JetBlue expands U.S.-Cuba service ahead of expected travel opening

content: NEW YORK JetBlue Airways Corp  on Tuesday forecast a potential rise in July unit revenue even as competitors projected steep drops  profiting from new premium-class seats while escaping capacity gluts in Dallas and Chicago.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue bucks airline industry outlook  sees strong demand

content: NEW YORK  July 28 JetBlue Airways Corp  on Tuesday forecast a potential rise in July unit revenue even as competitors projected steep drops  profiting from new premium-class seats while escaping capacity gluts in Dallas and Chicago.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-JetBlue bucks airline industry outlook  sees strong demand

content: July 28 JetBlue Airways Corp expects passenger unit revenue will not drop in July  bucking industry trends  because of strong demand for the carrier's service  its executives said on an investor call Tuesday.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue Airways says unit revenue will not drop in July

content: July 28 JetBlue Airways Corp grew its second-quarter profit in line with analysts' expectations as "solid" U.S. demand helped its bottom line  the company reported Tuesday.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue Airways 2nd-qtr results in line with profit estimates

content: July 3 JetBlue Airways Corp said it began direct charter flights between New York and Havana on Friday  the first major U.S. carrier to fly the route following U.S. President Barack Obama's decision in December to normalize relations with the Communist-ruled island.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue launches New York-to-Havana charter flights

content: June 30 JetBlue Airways Corp on Tuesday began charging its lowest-fare customers for checked bags  an anticipated move that leaves Southwest Airlines Co as the only U.S. carrier to let all travelers check a bag for free.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue Airways adds $20 checked bag fee per one-way trip

content: SAO PAULO/NEW YORK United Airlines has agreed to pay $100 million for a 5 percent stake in Azul SA  Brazil's third-biggest airline  as it attempts to catch up with U.S. rivals with more established ties in South America's biggest air travel market.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: United Airlines to pay $100 million for Azul stake  for foothold in Brazil

content: SAO PAULO/NEW YORK  June 26 United Airlines has agreed to pay $100 million for a 5 percent stake in Azul SA  Brazil's third-biggest airline  as it attempts to catch up with U.S. rivals with more established ties in South America's biggest air travel market.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-United Airlines to pay $100 mln for Azul stake  for foothold in Brazil

content: June 23 JetBlue Airways Corp on Tuesday said it will add its premium "Mint" class to transcontinental flights from Boston  the first new city for a service that JetBlue credits with helping it steal share from competitors.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue adds premium class to Boston flights on corporate demand

content: NEW YORK JetBlue Airways Corp  is eyeing a long-range plane from Airbus that could carry its customers to distant places abroad for the first time in its history  potentially growing its network in South America.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue Airways eyes long-range Airbus for growth overseas

content: Qatar Airways' chief executive officer on Monday called for the aviation industry's largest trade group to address protectionism  hitting back against U.S. airlines campaigning to restrict what they say is heavily subsidized competition from Gulf carriers.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: Qatar Airways CEO seeks curbs on U.S. rivals' 'protectionism'

content: MIAMI  June 8 Qatar Airways' chief executive officer on Monday called for the aviation industry's largest trade group to address protectionism  hitting back against U.S. airlines campaigning to restrict what they say is heavily subsidized competition from Gulf carriers.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Qatar Airways CEO seeks curbs on U.S. rivals' 'protectionism'

content: NEW YORK  May 20 JetBlue Airways Corp  believes it had no way to know it should have grounded a former pilot before his midair meltdown forced an emergency landing  and that his $14.9 million damages lawsuit should be dismissed.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue believes it could not predict ex-pilot's midair meltdown

content: JetBlue Airways Corp  shattered expectations Tuesday by forecasting a rise in April unit revenue while investors were braced for a decline  sending its stock up nearly 5 percent.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue forecasts unit revenue rise  stock soars

content: April 28 JetBlue Airways Corp shattered expectations Tuesday by forecasting a rise in April unit revenue while investors were braced for a decline  sending its stock up nearly 5 percent.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-JetBlue forecasts unit revenue rise  stock soars

content: April 28 JetBlue Airways Corp expects unit revenue to rise in April  while investors had anticipated a decline  Chief Financial Officer Mark Powers said during an investor call Tuesday.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue Airways Corp expects unit revenue rise in April

content: April 28 JetBlue Airways Corp's  first-quarter profit soared as strong U.S. domestic demand and cost control helped its bottom line  the company reported Tuesday.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue Airways Corp 1st-quarter profit soars

content: NEW YORK JetBlue Airways Corp   the fifth biggest U.S. airline by passengers carried  consistently cancels flights sooner than rivals when storms pummel the U.S. Northeast  a tactic that may help its customers reach destinations more reliably  a Reuters analysis of flight data shows.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue earliest to cancel during storms  says fewer refunds result

content: March 30 JetBlue Airways Corp's systems were back online after a computer system outage caused check-in delays at several U.S. airports on Monday.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue says systems back online after outage  rules out cyber attack

content: NEW YORK  March 27 A former JetBlue Airways Corp  pilot whose midair meltdown forced an emergency landing of a 2012 flight on Friday sued the carrier for $14.9 million  saying it should have grounded him because it knew he was incapable of flying.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue sued by ex-pilot who had midair meltdown

content: NEW YORK  March 27 A former JetBlue Airways Corp  pilot whose midair meltdown forced an emergency landing of a 2012 flight on Friday sued the carrier for $14.9 million  saying it should have grounded him because it knew he was incapable of flying.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-JetBlue sued by ex-pilot who had midair meltdown

content: JetBlue Airways Corp  said on Wednesday it expects its first-quarter unit revenue to grow between 3 percent and 4 percent from a year ago  in part due to storms shrinking capacity this winter season.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: JetBlue Airways expects quarterly unit revenue to grow 3-4 percent

content: March 11 JetBlue Airways Corp said on Wednesday it expects its first-quarter unit revenue to grow between 3 percent and 4 percent from a year ago  in part due to storms shrinking capacity this winter season.

title: UPDATE 1-JetBlue Airways expects quarterly unit revenue to grow 3-4 pct

content: Feb 26 A push by three U.S. airlines to curb competition from Gulf state carriers has triggered a sharp response from other powerful U.S. aviation companies including Boeing Co and FedEx Corp  potentially complicating the airlines' campaign for Obama administration support.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: RPT-Boeing  FedEx battle back vs U.S. airlines on Gulf competition

title: Boeing  FedEx battle back vs U.S. airlines on Gulf competition

content: BERLIN  Feb 18 Lufthansa is offering a cash incentive to holders of a bond exchangeable into JetBlue  shares to encourage them to exchange the notes ahead of the 2017 expiration date  as it seeks to reduce debt.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: Lufthansa seeks to reduce debt with JetBlue bond exchange offer

content: American Express Co   which said on Thursday that its credit card partnership with Costco Wholesale Corp  would end next year  is also ending its co-branded card deal with JetBlue Airways Corp   according to a published report.
name: JetBlue Airways Corporation
title: American Express and JetBlue ending card partnership: Bloomberg

content: Feb 13 American Express Co  which said on Thursday that its credit card partnership with Costco Wholesale Corp would end next year  is also ending its co-branded card deal with JetBlue Airways Corp  according to a published report.

title: American Express and JetBlue ending card partnership -Bloomberg

content: JetBlue Airways Corp  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as it benefited from lower fuel prices and flew more passengers.

title: JetBlue Airways profit beats estimate on cheaper fuel

content: Jan 29 JetBlue Airways Corp reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as it benefitted from lower fuel prices and flew more passengers.
